faq.question: How does the AI transformation work?
faq.answer: Our advanced AI analyzes your business card image, extracts key information like business name, contact details, and design elements, then creates a professional website tailored to your industry and brand aesthetic.

faq.question: How long does it take to create a website?
faq.answer: Most websites are generated within 30-60 seconds. The AI works in real-time to analyze your card and build a complete, functional website.

faq.question: Can I customize the generated website?
faq.answer: Yes! Pro and Business plans include advanced customization options. You can modify colors, layouts, content, add pages, and integrate additional features.

faq.question: What file formats do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept JPEG, PNG, and WebP image formats. For best results, ensure your business card image is clear, well-lit, and high resolution.

faq.question: Do I get a custom domain?
faq.answer: Pro and Business plans include custom domain support. Free plans use a Business Card to Website subdomain (yourname.card2web.com).

faq.question: Is there a money-back guarantee?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all paid plans. If you're not satisfied, we'll refund your payment in full.
